org.usfirst.frc.team1736.lib.SignalMath

Class FilterCoefs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team1736.lib.SignalMath.FilterCoefs

  • public final class FilterCoefs
extends java.lang.Object
    Pre-calculated Coefficients used for filter calculations. For all, sample rate presumed at 50Hz (20 ms).

    Derived from this online source. Peter Isza, you are a boss and I owe you a beverage!

        Stopband 4 Hz 25 Hz -60 dB 0.02 dB

        Stopband 17 Hz 25 Hz -60 dB 0.47 dB

      • highpass2HzCoef

        public static final double[] highpass2HzCoef
        81-tap filter. Phase Delay = 0.8s
        Zone Start End Nominal Gain Ripple
        Stopband 0 Hz 1.9 Hz -50 dB 0.62 dB
        Passband 3 Hz 25 Hz 0 dB 0.70 dB

        Passband 5 Hz 25 Hz 0 dB 0.67 dB
